title: Finding Will
creator_credit: Kym Levett, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: As the keeper of historical artifacts for his family, Kym Levett recently visited the parts of France that were battlefields during the Great War. He took his two sons and his mission is to find the remains of his great, great Uncle Will Cundy who had died fighting during the war. This is a story of the journey to bring Private William Cundy home.
